item.description:
Greater New Haven Unknown Zone invites its members and the specter of Helena Ruth Wooster
To join us for a cup of coffee.

This Restaurant was once the Wooster Estate of the late William HH Wooster.
Mr. Wooster once lived there with his wife and six children.
Mr. Wooster was considered to be a Captain of Industry.
He was involved with the Seymour Manufacturing Company, Trust and Water Company.
Mr. Wooster, his family members, and especially his daughter,
Ruth, are believed to have their spectral energies still within the Wooster Estate.

http://www.carouselga...

www.carouselgardens.com/

According to the Web Site, some of the happenings involve:

http://www.carouselga...

www.carouselgardens.com/paranormal.html


The Wooster ghostly cat is still prowling and meowing around.

Ghostly glasses are falling to the ground and making noises.

Coats are being tugged when no one is there.

A place on the table is left for Ruth. Maybe we should do that?

A Chef was giving a waitress a hard time. A Spoon fell on his head.
The waitress thanks Ruth for her support.


http://www.cosmicsoci...

www.cosmicsociety.com/carouselmeeting.htm


http://www.100megsfre...

www.100megsfree4.com/farshores/phaunt2.htm


http://books.google.c...

books.google.com/books?id=IhOaKHzVKgYC&pg=PA6&lpg=PA6&dq=carousel+gardens+ruth&source=web&ots=_ZreucZXtC&sig=ddn6oO4Z-Ijhg12W0hkk-P93fis#PPA6,M1

Doors open when no one is there.

Please bring your camera to this coffee and maybe spectral energy Meet Up.

Maybe we can get photos of at least orbs, if not even more energy forms.
The Carousel Gardens Restaurant (CGR) websites has photos of orbs.

Maybe the Ghost Investigators will share their stories of the investigations that
They have done in this restaurant.

Maybes will be allowed.

This will be a joint Coffee Talk & Unknown Zone
Meet Up.

Our members might want to come here on their
Own for:

Fridays for Karaoke

First Wednesdays of the month for the Cosmic Societys
Ghost Hunter Meeting

Psychic Fairs

We might add more information as we get closer to the event date.

January 26,

Tony Diana has agreed to give a lecture at this Meet Up.
That is unless some urgent case does not come up.
He might be able to work with Carousel Gardens
In case he needs some presentation equipment for the room.
At this time it is unknown if Tony will be bringing any guests with him.

All other members who attend this meet up are encouraged to
Add to the discussion of the Meet Up during the Q & A
and after the lecture.

On Saturday, January 26, I went there in person to
Confirm the reservation and leave a deposit.

It is just off Rt 67. Coming from West Haven / New Haven, I really
Did not see the sign. I had to go beyond Rt. 8 and turn around
in a McDonalds (after getting a coffee) and
Then I saw the huge CGR sign.

It is on North Street, but I could not
Find a North Street sign any where at that intersection.
I got it, the specter energy keeps taking the street sign?
Actually, more than likely local kids took it down and the
State is slow in putting one back up.

The best way to describe where it is...
On Rt 67, when you get into Seymour, look for an intersection
That has a Gulf Gas Station, Village View Pizza Restaurant,
Exxon Gas Station and Citgo Gas Station.
CGR is up a hill right behind the Gulf Gas Station.

I shall cancel and reschedule this Meet Up if there is any
Adverse weather that might affect the driving conditions.
Rt 67 is full of dangerous curves during normal
Driving Conditions.
Rt 34 to 115 to 67 was a little less risky than Rt 67.

Tuesday, Feb. 19
Ghost Investigator Tony Diana and his sister, Psychic
Medium Angelina Diana have confirmed that they
Are both attending this Meet Up.
Angelina might be doing randon psychic readings
At this Meet Up.

If you want to know more about Angelina, then
Her Meet UP link is below.

http://psychics.meetu...

psychics.meetup.com/273/

Mike B.
Organizer
Greater New Haven Unknown Zone

Assistant Organizer of Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: I have reserved a room in my name at the restaurant.
item.why: Who wants to have a hot drink and brunch in a haunted restaurant?

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Coffee in a Ghostly Seymour Restaurant
